display_long_description:
You are Agent Q, a veteran of the elite force B.A.R.D., defending peace across the galaxy from space pirates! 

Protect the precious Galaxy Orb, spread across miniature planets, from the notorious space pirate Tumai! Dive into a world of adventure puzzles, gear up with your sleek watch, hop into your agent car, and traverse the stars.                          


# 💫 LEAVE NOTHING OVERLOOKED
Find objects hidden throughout the game to assist the Muddles and capture Tumai. Grateful Muddles will provide you with crucial clues leading to the Galaxy Orb! 
[media]



# 💫 ACT SWIFTLY TO OUTWIT TUMAI
Even if your fellow agent is caught in Tumai’s traps, don’t panic. Solve the puzzles quickly to rescue your partner and thwart Tumai’s schemes. 

When a giant Tumai attacks Agent Q, counter or evade its moves by matching the rhythm. Your extraordinary sense of rhythm will save the galaxy!
[media]



# 💫 TUMAI COLLECTION: PROOF OF YOUR MASTERY
Each captured Tumai will be displayed like a collectible art toy. Collect them all and become a living legend of B.A.R.D.!
[media]



# 💫 DON'T MISS THE HIDDEN COINS
During your missions, be sure to collect coins hidden throughout the stages to gather Muddles. Collecting Muddles will unlock a miniature set that vividly portrays their everyday lives!
[media]



# 💫 FILL YOUR ROOM WITH MINIATURES
Transform your room into a gateway to the enchanting world of Monia! Display your collectibles however you like and share your incredible achievements with family and friends!
[media]
